title: #TexasPowerOutage: Green Energy FAILS America! | Bryan Callen Guests | Louder with Crowder
description: So much for the power of green energy. The Texas power outages have utterly exposed the failures of green energy and the power of fossil fuels. Then we delve into Biden’s new gun-grabbing agenda for America. Is it as bad as advertised? And who exactly are the so-called “experts” Governor Andrew Cuomo is following?
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
